speaker: Unknown
text: Hi Ravin, I am a counselor at Misochi AI.

speaker: Unknown
text: Basically we have launched a program to learn AI engineering in just 3 months

speaker: Unknown
text: where you will be landing and having an offer of 18 LPA.

speaker: Unknown
text: The conditions are you have to quit your job whatever you are currently having

speaker: Unknown
text: and join our organization, Bootcamp and then you will get the offer.

speaker: Unknown
text: How about your response? Do you like it?

speaker: Unknown
text: So the program looks very impressive but to quit the job for time being

speaker: Unknown
text: it is not feasible for me right now.

speaker: Unknown
text: So is there any alternative solution like we can have a lecture if there is a part time or something.

speaker: Unknown
